captions.text:
(Upbeat music) [M] Spudgy, do you want me to let you know 
 why it is you are not moving? (Spudgy snubs Martina
He hates his sweater) [Sp] No.

[M] Are you grumpy because I bought you an 
 outfit that makes you look like a clown?
[Sp] I hate it.
[M] Spudgy, it was by doctor's order, I had to get you this outfit.

The doctor told me you need to be warm in the wintertime 
 or you might have a heart attack when you're peeing.
(Both laugh) [S] Or he's gonna die. [M] He said that because oh god.
He told me that because... [Sp] I don't care.
[M] Listen, let me finish. [Sp] No, I'm not listening.

[M] He told me because you have a 
 heart condition, if you peed... [Sp] Lalalala.

[M] and you get cold, you could have a heart 
 attack, so I bought you this because it's fuzzy.

[S] The real reason is because if he pees, all the warmth leaves 
 his body abruptly, and the shock could cause a heart attack.
[M] But he's so grumpy, he won't even walk in this.
Look Spudgy, I cut off two bows for you.
There was a yellow bow and a pink bow,
and I chopped it off for you.
I bought this because it's warm, ok? Don't be so mad at me.
Heyyyy. [Sp] No. [M] Heyyy.
[S] Nooo. [M] Simon, Spudgy's ignoring me.
C'mon Spudgy.
(Pats leg) [Sp] No. I'm not jogging to you.

[M] Why do you look so drugged up? You look drugged up 
 because I put you in a sweater, are you falling asleep?
He's totally falling asleep on me. What the heck?
Thanks for watching Spudgy on Open The Happy! (Upbeat OpenTheHappy music)
